title: What is the Alexa Echo Dot smart speaker? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey, Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Generation is the best and affordable smart Speaker. It is small in size with vibrant fabric design . Sound Quality is much better then the previous versions of echo dot. It is even better then Google Home mini. Alexa is much improved then the past . It is a 360 degree device which hears us from all side a provide information like news, weather , poetry ryhmes,stories , etc . Along with english it has hindi language also included . Best for music lovers to play any music any time. You can have a look on my review article on Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Generation here . For any query about it you can message me. Thank You
